data.description: A comprehensive survey of Polish literature and its historical background from 1863 to the present. Readings in Polish.
data.title: HISTORY OF POLISH LITERATURE AFTER 1863

data.description: Intensive study of major writers such as Kochanowski, Sep Szarzynski, Krasicki, Mickiewicz, and Slowacki. Readings in Polish.
data.title: HISTORY OF POLISH LITERATURE UNTIL 1863
